starts.title: Both players shake hands with each other
starts.extra: ... warmly, using both hands and eye contact

starts.title: Give each other a side-hug
starts.extra: Also, hold it 20 seconds and synch breathing

examples.title: Both players give each other a gentle high-five
examples.extra: Also, make it a lingering high-five with eye contact

examples.title: Both players hold hands for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Also, interlace fingers and sync three breaths

examples.title: Current player gives dare acceptor a quick shoulder squeeze
examples.extra: Also, add a gentle neck rub

examples.title: Sit side by side with shoulders touching for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Also, both put an arm around the other player

examples.title: Current player gives dare acceptor a simple hand massage (one hand)
examples.extra: Also, massage both hands slowly

examples.title: Exchange a front hug for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Also, sway slowly together

examples.title: Sit facing each other with knees touching for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Also, maintain soft eye contact

examples.title: Current player gives dare acceptor a gentle scalp massage
examples.extra: Also, include a slow temple rub

examples.title: Both players give each other light back scratches over clothes
examples.extra: Also, draw slow lines down the back

examples.title: Sit back-to-back and breathe together for five slow breaths
examples.extra: Also, reach back and hold hands behind you

examples.title: Current player gives dare acceptor an over-clothes shoulder and upper-back massage
examples.extra: Also extend the massage to lower back

examples.title: Both players trace gentle shapes on each other's forearms
examples.extra: Also, trace slowly from wrist to elbow

examples.title: Sit close with thighs touching and lean into each other
examples.extra: Also, wrap one arm around each other

examples.title: Current player gives dare acceptor a foot rub through socks
examples.extra: Also, rub calves

examples.title: Place forehead to forehead for 20 seconds
examples.extra: Also, rub noses gently

examples.title: Sit with one player between the other's legs facing forward; outer player wraps arms around waist
examples.extra: Also, rest chin on the other's shoulder

examples.title: Current player gives dare acceptor a full back massage over clothes for 1 minute
examples.extra: Also, include the upper arms

examples.title: Lie on your sides facing each other and embrace for 30 seconds
examples.extra: Also, touch foreheads while breathing together

examples.title: Dare acceptor rests head in current player's lap; current player gently strokes hair
examples.extra: Also, include a light temple massage

examples.title: Spoon on your sides for 1 minute
examples.extra: Also, outer player's hand on inner players stomach under shirt

examples.title: Sit on the floor with one between the other's legs facing the same direction; cuddle close
examples.extra: Also, hands on stomach, underneath shirt

examples.title: Lie side by side facing each other and cuddle with full-body contact (clothed)
examples.extra: Also, intertwine legs lightly

examples.title: Sit in a chair with dare acceptor sideways on current player's lap for a cuddle
examples.extra: Also, stroke back underneath shirt

examples.title: Lie face-to-face; dare acceptor drapes one leg over current player's hips and cuddle close
examples.extra: Also, play with each other's hair

examples.title: Straddle cuddle: dare acceptor sits astride current player's lap for a close hug
examples.extra: Stroke each other's back under the shirt

examples.title: Lie chest-to-chest with one person on top
examples.extra: Also synchronize breathing

examples.title: Spoon tightly under a blanket with legs entwined
examples.extra: Outer player's hand rests on inner player's chest
